verses.name: Proverbs 12:1
verses.text: Whoso loveth instruction loveth knowledge: but he that hateth reproof is brutish.

verses.name: Proverbs 12:2
verses.text: A good man obtaineth favour of the Lord: but a man of wicked devices will he condemn.

verses.name: Proverbs 12:3
verses.text: A man shall not be established by wickedness: but the root of the righteous shall not be moved.

verses.name: Proverbs 12:4
verses.text: A virtuous woman is a crown to her husband: but she that maketh ashamed is as rottenness in his bones.

verses.name: Proverbs 12:5
verses.text: The thoughts of the righteous are right: but the counsels of the wicked are deceit.
